channel.title: Npc dialogues
channel.description: I set up my npc dialogue and everything but what I'm trying to do is figure out how to make the text show up on multiple lines. When I add another line by changing the number after the text it doesn't work or when I change the click to continue text it makes the text I put clickable. So all I want is to know how to make the text apear on different lines. Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 03:01:16 pm[/size][hr]P.S. I'm using Figment base

item.title: Npc dialogues
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

I set up my npc dialogue and everything but what I’m trying to do is figure out how to make the text show up on multiple lines. When I add another line by changing the number after the text it doesn’t work or when I change the click to continue text it makes the text I put clickable. So all I want is to know how to make the text apear on different lines. Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 03:01:16 pm[/size][hr]P.S. I’m using Figment base
